item.title: PPL Corp 10-K
item.description: PPL Corp, which is in the Electric Services [4911] industry, SEC 10-K filing on February 17, 2023 had 72965 (cleaned) words - 600 were utilized for the visualizations. Top Words: ppl - 1469 instances 1 - 688 instances electric - 618 instances 2022 - 584 instances income - 561 instances See the parsed data used in the visualization here. View the actual filing on the SEC website here
